definition: time of going to work/the morning rush hour
on top/upon/above/upper/previous/first (of multiple parts)/to climb/to get onto/to go up/to attend (class or university)
gap/to separate/to thin out (seedlings)/to sow discontent
between/among/within a definite time or space/room/section of a room or lateral space between two pairs of pillars/classifier for rooms

sentences.english: Office workers in South Korea have been trying various ways to peek at the Olympic matches during working hours.
sentences.chinese: 为在上班时间偷看奥运比赛，韩国上班族花样百出。

sentences.english: Maybe it’s because they drink alcohol while on duty.
sentences.chinese: 可能是因为他们在上班时间里喝酒喝高了吧。

sentences.english: Six times so far this year, air traffic controllers at US airport have fallen asleep on the job.
sentences.chinese: 这是今年第六次美国机场空管人员在上班时间睡觉。

sentences.english: Flextime allows an employee to select the hours he or she will work.
sentences.chinese: 弹性上班制度允许员工自主选择上班时间。

sentences.english: No sleeping and no snoozing on the job.
sentences.chinese: 上班时间不能睡觉和打盹。

sentences.english: This could be construed as promoting your business on company time.
sentences.chinese: 这可以理解为利用上班时间经营自己的生意。

sentences.english: I don't care for it, anyhow, during business hours.
sentences.chinese: 不管怎样，我觉得无所谓，特别是在上班时间。

sentences.english: No one in this workshop uses work hours to do private jobs.
sentences.chinese: 这个车间里没有人利用上班时间干私活。

sentences.english: She works as a receptionist in a company and runs her online shop at work.
sentences.chinese: 她在一家公司做前台，然后在上班时间经营她的网店。

sentences.english: "I pretty much control my own hours, " he said.
sentences.chinese: “我一般可以控制自己的上班时间”他说。

sentences.english: During the office hour, anybody who punches the cock 15 minutes later should ask for a leave.
sentences.chinese: 上班时间，15分钟以后打卡者须以请假办理。

sentences.english: Is Suzhou administration centre office hours a number?
sentences.chinese: 苏州行政中心上班时间是多少？

sentences.english: And it’s not just in office hours.
sentences.chinese: 这种情况不只是在上班时间发生。

sentences.english: He lost a whole year's bonuses for moonlighting during office hours.
sentences.chinese: 他因利用上班时间干私活被罚没全年奖金。

sentences.english: Chatting on the phone for long periods during office hours should not be tolerated.
sentences.chinese: 上班时间没完没了打电话是不能容忍的。

sentences.english: If not in office hours, please return to the Male Dormitory Security Guard and tell them your name.
sentences.chinese: 若非上班时间，缴回门口警卫室并注明下你的名字。

definition: to finish work/to get off work
to go to work/to be on duty/to start work/to go to the office
to shift holidays, taking a weekday off
to change shifts/to work in turns
to skip work/to sneak out of work early
